content: "He said Cornell suffered an abusive childhood that left him socially impaired and therefore unable to resolve his qualms about serving in a war zone with his commanders." What the holy hell in a handbasket, Batman!??! I didn't seem to bother him for the years he spent in to make E4 rank, did it? I thought I'd heard every excuse in the book, but this here doozy takes the cake. And then he has the audacity to cry and say how sorry he was? Yeah, he was so sorry that he wouldn't turn himself in for FOUR YEARS, and at that it took Canada threatening to turn him over. He got off too easy. It's not that there is no God or that He isn't listening. You're probably just asking the wrong questions.

content: Sentencing is not only to punish an offender, it also reminds others of the consequences of bad behavior. With such a light penalty some may feel the risk is worth it.
